about.summary: Batched is a flexible and efficient batch processing library implemented in Python. It supports asynchronous batch processing with dynamic batching and prioritization.

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "0.1.4"
  python_min: "3.10"  # they use X|Y type unions

package:
  name: batched
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
- url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/b/batched/batched-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 98344c450d23b1612d5c2d6462ad43428602c80c12cd8d803ead5e4616dd5c59

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install .
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
  - python ${{ python_min }}.*
  - setuptools >=61.0
  - pip
  run:
  - python >=${{ python_min }}

tests:
- python:
    python_version: ${{ python_min }}
    imports:
    - batched
    pip_check: true

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/mixedbread-ai/batched
  summary: Batched is a flexible and efficient batch processing library implemented in Python. It supports asynchronous batch processing with dynamic batching and prioritization.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
  - moritzwilksch
